name: rapid-prototyping-wizard
description: Utilize edge new exponential technoligies in your project and business

scripts.build: rm -rf ./out && next build && next export && echo "prototyping.hejny.org" > ./out/CNAME && echo "" > ./out/.nojekyll
scripts.prettier-commit: git diff --exit-code && npm run prettier && git add . && git commit --allow-empty -m "ðŸ§¹ Prettier"
scripts.preversion: git pull && npm run prettier-commit&& npm run lint && npm test
